import '../styles/tour-detail.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour return (
) } export default TourDetails
